resources.string: The given parameter is not valid.\nPlease enter again and ensure it is not empty.
There went something terribly wrong. Run, run as fast as you can! 8-o
A parameter must not be null.\nPlease enter again and ensure it is not empty.
Could not contact server.\nPlease check your internet connection.
Your password has not been initialized yet.\nPlease reset your password.
Could not perform a login.\nPlease log in manually and check whether your username and password are correct.
An unknown exception occurred.\nIf this happens again please contact your service.
